S04bsu003_u:2_0: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharatisma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā
S04bsu003_u:3: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśrīyāṃ kumārabhūtām āmantrayate sma /
S04bsu003_u:4_1: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ
S04bsu003_u:8_0: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma
S04bsu003_u:8_1: dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātram api śroṣyanti yāvat pustakagatām
S04bsu003_u:8_3: samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjāyiṣyanti te parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ punaraiva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu003_u:9: ye khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ sattvastasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S04bsu003_u:11: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣām apyāyurvivardhayiṣyati // 3 //
S04bsu003_u:12_0: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrīdirghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmaḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā
S04bsu003_u:12_1: tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti teṣām ime
S04bsu003_u:13: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksambuddhāya,
S04bsu003_u:16: om sarvasaṃskāra pariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayāparivāre svāhā // 5 //
S04bsu003_u:17: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmoṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecil likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S04bsu003_u:22: tena khalu punaḥ samayena navanavatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 7 //
S04bsu003_u:24: tena khalu punaḥ samayena caturaśītīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 8 //
S04bsu003_u:26: tena khalu punaḥ samayena saptasaptatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 9 //
S04bsu003_u:28: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaṣaṣṭīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 10 //
S04bsu003_u:30: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcapañcaśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 11 //
S04bsu003_u:32: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcacatvāriśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 12 //
S04bsu003_u:34: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ṣaṭtriṃśatīnāṃ Buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 13 //
S04bsu003_u:36: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcaviṃśatīnāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 14 //
S04bsu003_u:38: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgānadīvālukopamānāṃ buddhakoṭīnām ekamatenaikasvareṇa idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ bhāṣitam // 15 //
S04bsu003_u:40: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa na kadācinnarakeṣūpapadyate na tīryagyonau na yamaloke na akṣaṇeṣu ca kadācid api upapasyate /
S04bsu003_u:41: yatra yatra janmanyupapadyate, tatra tatra sarvatra jātau jātau jātismaro bhaviṣyanti // 17 //
S04bsu003_u:43: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmaskandhasahasrāṇi likhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 18 //
S04bsu003_u:45: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tena caturaśītidharmarājikāsahasrāṇi kārāpitāni pratiṣṭhāpitāni bhaviṣyanti // 19 //
S04bsu003_u:47: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya pañcānantaryāṇi karmāvaraṇāni parikṣayaṃ gacchanti // 20 //
S04bsu003_u:49: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:50: tasya na māro na mārakāyikā na yakṣa na rākṣasā nākālamṛtyurevatāraṃ lapsyante // 22 //
S04bsu003_u:52: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:53: tasya maraṇakālasamaye navanavatayo buddhakoṭyaḥ sammukhaṃ darśanaṃ dāsyanti,
S04bsu003_u:56: nātra kāṅkṣā na vicikitsā na vimātirutpādayitavyā // 23 //
S04bsu003_u:58: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:59: tasya catvāro mahārājānaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddha rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyanti // 24 //
S04bsu003_u:61: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati sa sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau amitābhasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetre upapadyate // 25 //
S04bsu003_u:63: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati,
S04bsu003_u:65: yeṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ mṛgapakṣīnāṃ karṇapuṭe nipatiṣyati te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyak sambodhau abhisambodhim abhisambhotsyante // 26 //
S04bsu003_u:67: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati tasya strībhāvo na kadācid api bhaviṣyati // 27 //
S04bsu003_u:69: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ dharmaparyāyam uddiśya ekam api kārṣāpaṇaṃ dānaṃ dāsyati,
S04bsu003_u:70: tena trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇaṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavati // 28 //
S04bsu003_u:72: ya idam dharmabhāṇakaṃ pūjayiṣyati, tena sakalasamāptaḥ saddharmaḥ pūjito bhavati // 29 //
S04bsu003_u:74: yathā vipaśviśikhiviśvabhukrakucchandakanakamunikāśyapaśākyamuniprabhṛtīnāṃ tathāgatānāṃ saptaratnamayaḥ pūjāḥ kṛtvā tasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ,
S04bsu003_u:75: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 30 //
S04bsu003_u:77: yathā sumeroḥ parvatarājasya samānāṃ ratnarāśiṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadyāt,
S04bsu003_u:79: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 31 //
S04bsu003_u:83: na tvāparimitāyuḥ sūtrasya puṇyaskandhasya pramāṇaṃ śakyaṃ gaṇayitum // 32 //
S04bsu003_u:85: ya idam aparimitāyuḥ sūtraṃ likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati saṃskṛtya pūjayiṣyati tena daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu sarvatathāgatā vanditāḥ pūjitāśca bhaviṣyanti // 33 //
S04bsu003_u:88: dānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 34 //
S04bsu003_u:90: śīlabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 35 //
S04bsu003_u:92: kṣāntibalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 36 //
S04bsu003_u:94: vīryabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 37 //
S04bsu003_u:96: dhyānabalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 38 //
S04bsu003_u:98: prajñābalasya ca śrūyati śabda kāruṇikasya pure praviśantaṃ // 39 //
S04bsu003_u:100: idam vocadbhagavān āttamanaste ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattva mahāsattvaḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanam iti // 40 //
